metadata.title: CVE-2022-47021 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in functions op_get_dataand op_open1 in opusfile.c in xiph opusfile 0.9 thru 0.12 allows attackersto cause denial of service or other unspecified impacts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopusfile0 - 0.9+20170913-1ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opusfile package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9+20170913-1ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
